verbose_text: Moreover, Arc levels would need to be restored to near-endogenous levels, as overexpressing Arc strongly decreases synaptic alpha-amino-3-hydroxy-5-methyl-4-isoxazolepropionic acid receptor expression and occludes mGluR dependent LTD.
evidence: Arc strongly decreases synaptic alpha-amino-3-hydroxy-5-methyl-4-isoxazolepropionic acid receptor expression and occludes mGluR-dependent LTD
